channel.title: Nublic Source v1.4
channel.description:
[CENTER][B][SIZE=4]Nublic Source By Jerboa1994[/SIZE][/B][/CENTER]
[B]DOWNLOAD LINK:[/B]
[B]Features;[/B]
Remastered packaging. More efficient. Implements python for scripting. Full shanty, with pass added simply through scripts. Added a decent woodcutting base which supports timers and animations. Added cooking, supports timers, interfaces and animations. Added herblore through scripts, more efficient. Added a decent firemaking base. Added a completely remastered dialogue system which uses scripts to save space and remove those long switch statements. Added object management through scripts, all three scripts are now managed. Added a decent mining base. Cleaned many files. Added a very decent and basic system for crafting. Added an action button system which is handled through scripts. Added an extremely basic report handler, doesn't have much of an effect yet. Represents a closely related world to Runescape. Added fully working bone burying using scripts. Supports a food managing system through scripts. Npc clicking packets are handled by scripts. Command management is handled through scripts. Contains all the basic features of emulous 1.7, special attacks, both magic books, range and dueling.
[B]Media;[/B]
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/ofysdl.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/de4kuv.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/b509ph.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/30135n4.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2j134sh.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/25im1j9.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/ilau8k.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2eezgph.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/o7umvl.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/25i8bqr.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2akcpkx.jpg[/img]
[B]DOWNLOAD LINK:[/B]
I will upload mirrors in a bit, I'm tired right now.
